data.name_ja_from_wiki: アルバス・ダンブルドア
data.name_ja: アルバス・ダンブルドア
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP
data.description_en: Professor Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore, , Grand Sorc., D. Wiz., X.J. (sorc.), S.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【アルバス・ダンブルドア】ホグワーツ魔法魔術学校の校長。20世紀最大の魔法使いと評され、ヴォルデモート卿が唯一恐れた人物。不死鳥の騎士団の創設者として、闇の魔法使いとの戦いを指揮しました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Draco Lucius Malfoy (b. 5 June 1980) was an English pure-blood wizard and the only son of Lucius and Narcissa Malfoy . The son of a Death Eater, Draco was raised to strongly believe in the importance of blood purity.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ドラコ・マルフォイ】純血主義を信奉するスリザリン生。ハリーの学生時代のライバルで、後にヴォルデモート卿からダンブルドア殺害の任務を与えられますが、完遂はできませんでした。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Auror Harry James Potter (b. 31 July 1980) This powerful charm would protect him until he either came of age, or no longer called his aunt's house home. Due to Petunia's resentment of her sister and her magical abilities, Harry grew up abused and neglected.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ハリー・ポッター】他でもない、「生き残った男の子」として知られる主人公。1歳の時にヴォルデモート卿の攻撃から生き延び、ホグワーツで魔法を学びながらヴォルデモートと対峙しました。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: ハーマイオニー・グレンジャー
data.name_ja: ハーマイオニー・グレンジャー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Minister Hermione Jean Granger (b. 19 September 1979) was an English Muggle-born witch born to Mr and Mrs Granger. At the age of eleven, she learned about her magical nature and was accepted into Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ハーマイオニー・グレンジャー】マグル生まれの優秀な魔女。ホグワーツ史上最も聡明な生徒の一人で、ハリーとロンとともに数々の冒険を経験し、後に魔法省に入省なりました。

data.book_appearances: OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Professor Luna Scamander (née Lovegood) (b. 13 February 1981) was a witch and the only child and daughter of Xenophilius and Pandora Lovegood. Her mother accidentally died while experimenting with spells when Luna was nine and thus Luna was raised by her father, editor of the magazine The Quibbler, in a rook-like house near the village of Ottery St Catchpole in Devon.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ルーナ・ラブグッド】レイブンクロー寮の独特な世界観を持つ魔女。「ザ・クィブラー」編集長の娘で、ダンブルドア軍団の一員として神秘部の戦いにも参加しました。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: ミネルバ・マクゴナガル
data.name_ja: ミネルバ・マクゴナガル
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Professor Minerva McGonagall, , (b. 4 October) was a Scottish half-blood witch, the only daughter of Muggle Robert McGonagall and witch Isobel McGonagall. She also was the older sister of Malcolm and Robert Jnr.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ミネルバ・マクゴナガル】ホグワーツの変身術教授でグリフィンドール寮の寮監。厳格ながら公正な教師で、不死鳥の騎士団のメンバーとしても活躍しました。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: ネビル・ロングボトム
data.name_ja: ネビル・ロングボトム
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Professor Neville Longbottom (b. 30 July 1980) was a British pure-blood wizard, the only child and son of Frank and Alice Longbottom. Neville's parents were well-respected Aurors and members of the original Order of the Phoenix until they were tortured into insanity by Bellatrix Lestrange and three other Death Eaters with the Cruciatus Curse when he was about sixteen months old.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ネビル・ロングボトム】グリフィンドール寮の勇敢な魔法使い。両親を死喰い人に拷問され、当初は自信のない少年でしたが、ホグワーツの戦いでナギニを倒す英雄となりました。

data.book_appearances: PS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Professor Remus John Lupin, , (10 March 1960 – 2 May 1998), also known as Moony, was a half-blood wizard and the only son of Lyall and Hope Lupin . He was attacked by werewolf Fenrir Greyback when he was a child, a result of Greyback's revenge against Lyall, leaving Remus afflicted with lycanthropy for life. He attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry from 1971 to 1978 and was Sorted into Gryffindor House.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【リーマス・ルーピン】ホグワーツの闇の魔術に対する防衛術教授を務めた魔法使い。悪戯仕掛け人の一員で、ハリーの父ジェームズの親友でした。幼い息子を残し、ホグワーツの戦いで戦死しました。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: ルビウス・ハグリッド
data.name_ja: ルビウス・ハグリッド
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Professor Rubeus Hagrid (b. 6 December 1928) was an English half-giant wizard, son of Mr Hagrid and the giantess Fridwulfa, and elder half-brother of the giant Grawp. Hagrid attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in 1940 and was Sorted into Gryffindor house.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ルビウス・ハグリッド】ホグワーツの森番で半巨人の魔法使い。心優しく魔法生物を愛し、ハリーを魔法界に導いた最初の人物です。後に魔法生物飼育学の教授となりました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Professor Severus Snape (9 January 1960 Snape joined the Death Eaters along with a group of his fellow Slytherins. Severus was made a member of the Slug Club presumably because of his talent in Potion-making. Horace Slughorn even kept a picture of him as a student, clutching his copy of Advanced Potion-Making.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【セブルス・スネイプ】ホグワーツの魔法薬学教授で、後に闇の魔術に対する防衛術教授となった魔法使い。複雑な過去を持ち、リリー・ポッターへの愛がその行動の原動力でした。

data.book_appearances: PS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP
data.description_en: Sirius Black III (3 November 1959 – 18 June 1996), also known as Padfoot or Snuffles (in his Animagus form), was an English pure-blood wizard, the eldest son of Orion and Walburga Black, the older brother of Regulus Black, and godfather of Harry Potter. Although he was the heir of the House of Black, Sirius disagreed with his family's belief in blood purity and defied tradition when he was Sorted into Gryffindor House instead of Slytherin at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, which he attended from 1971 to 1978. As the rest of his family had been in Slytherin, he was the odd one out.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【シリウス・ブラック】ハリーの名付け親で悪戯仕掛け人の一人。未登録のアニメーガスで犬に変身できます。無実の罪でアズカバンに投獄されましたが、脱獄してハリーを守りました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, GOF, OOTP, DH
data.description_en: Tom Marvolo Riddle – 2 May 1998), later known as Lord Voldemort or, alternatively as the Dark Lord, You-Know-Who, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named, or, just simply Voldemort, was an English half-blood He was amongst the greatest wizards to have ever lived, rivalled only by Albus Dumbledore. Descended from Salazar Slytherin on his mother's side, through the House of Gaunt, Tom Riddle was conceived whilst his father, Tom Riddle Senior, was under the effects of a love potion supplied by his mother, Merope Gaunt. When the enchantment was lifted, Tom's father abandoned his pregnant wife and returned to Little Hangleton.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ヴォルデモート卿】20世紀の闇の魔法使いで、あまりに恐れられたため「例のあの人」と人々は呼び、その名すら恐れられました。サラザール・スリザリンの末裔で、分霊箱を作り不死を追求しました。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: アリシア・スピネット
data.name_ja: アリシア・スピネット
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Alicia Spinnet (b. 1977/1978) was a witch and Gryffindor student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry from 1989-1996. She played as a reserve Chaser and later Chaser on the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【アリシア・スピネット】グリフィンドール・クィディッチチームのチェイサー。ハリーの先輩として活躍し、ダンブルドア軍団のメンバーとしてホグワーツの戦いにも参加しました。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: アンジェリーナ・ジョンソン
data.name_ja: アンジェリーナ・ジョンソン
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Angelina Weasley (née Johnson) (b. 24–30 October 1977) was a witch and a Gryffindor student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She was also a member of Dumbledore's Army, an organisation taught and led by Harry Potter.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【アンジェリーナ・ジョンソン】グリフィンドール・クィディッチチームのチェイサーで、後にキャプテンを務めた魔女。卒業後はフレッド・ウィーズリーと結婚し、ホグワーツの戦いにも参加しました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Argus Filch was a Squib and the caretaker of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry since around 1973. Filch usually wandered around the school corridors with his cat Mrs Norris, trying to catch students breaking the school rules and complaining about Peeves the Poltergeist. In 1992, after Mrs Norris was petrified by Salazar Slytherin's Basilisk, Filch was furious; however, his cat was healed by the end of the year.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【アーガス・フィルチ】ホグワーツの管理人でスクイブ。愛猫ミセス・ノリスとともに校内を巡回し、規則違反の生徒を取り締まる厳格な性格で知られています。

data.name_ja: アーサー・ウィーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Arthur Weasley (b. 6 February 1950) was an English pure-blood wizard in the employ of the Ministry of Magic, as well as a member of the second Order of the Phoenix. He was a staunch believer in the equality of all magical and Muggle folk and was the head of the Weasley family.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【アーサー・ウィーズリー】魔法省のマグル製品不正使用取締局に勤務する純血の魔法使い。ウィーズリー家の父で、マグル文化に深い興味を持ち、不死鳥の騎士団のメンバーとして活動しました。

data.name_ja: オーガスタ・ロングボトム
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Augusta Longbottom (b. pre-1947) was a pure-blood witch who married into the Longbottom family. She was the mother of famous Auror Frank Longbottom, mother-in-law to Auror Alice Longbottom, and grandmother to Neville Longbottom.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【オーガスタ・ロングボトム】ネビル・ロングボトムの祖母。厳格な性格で孫に高い期待を寄せました。ホグワーツの戦いでは勇敢に戦う姿を見せました。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: コーネリウス・ファッジ
data.name_ja: コーネリウス・ファッジ
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Minister Cornelius Oswald Fudge, , was a British wizard who served as the thirty-second Minister for Magic of the British Ministry of Magic, in office from 1990 to 1996. Although reliant on the advice of Albus Dumbledore at first, by the height of his power, he had complete control of the Ministry of Magic, as well as extensive influence over the publishing of the Daily Prophet. Fudge began his career in the Ministry as Junior Minister in the Department of Magical Accidents and Catastrophes.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【コーネリウス・ファッジ】魔法大臣を務めた魔法使い。ヴォルデモート卿の復活を認めることを拒否し、ハリーとダンブルドアを中傷するキャンペーンを展開しました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Dean Thomas (b. c. 1980) was an English half-blood wizard, the son of a wizard and a Muggle mother.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ディーン・トーマス】グリフィンドール寮の魔法使いで、ハリーのクラスメイト。サッカーファンで、ダンブルドア軍団のメンバーとしてホグワーツの戦いに参加しました。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: ダドリー・ダーズリー
data.name_ja: ダドリー・ダーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Dudley Dursley (b. 23 June 1980) was the Muggle son and only child of Vernon and Petunia Dursley and the cousin of Harry Potter. He was obese and insolent as a result of his parents spoiling him throughout his childhood, although he became muscular in his teens.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ダドリー・ダーズリー】ハリーの従兄弟でマグル。両親に溺愛され傲慢に育ちましたが、吸魂鬼に襲われた後、ハリーに対する態度を改めました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Fang (b. circa 1984) was an over-sized boarhound dog, and one of the pets under Rubeus Hagrid's ownership and care. and the Battle of Hogwarts.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ファング】ハグリッドの飼い犬で大型のボアハウンド。見た目は恐ろしいものの、実際は臆病で優しい性格をしています。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: The Fat Lady was a witch depicted in a portrait who guarded the entrance to Gryffindor Tower at Hogwarts Castle. She asked for a password before letting anyone in, then swung her picture backward so that students could enter through a portrait hole.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【太った婦人】グリフィンドール塔の入口を守る肖像画の魔女。合言葉を知る者だけを通し、シリウス・ブラックに襲撃されたこともあります。

data.name_ja_from_wiki: フィリウス・フリットウィック
data.name_ja: フィリウス・フリットウィック
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Professor Filius Flitwick (b. 17 October who attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and was Sorted into Ravenclaw House, being an intelligent young man and a model student. Some time after his graduation, Flitwick returned to Hogwarts and became the Charms Master, as well as the Head of Ravenclaw House.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【フィリウス・フリットウィック】ホグワーツの呪文学教授でレイブンクロー寮の寮監。小柄な体格ながら、優れた魔法使いで決闘の名手としても知られています。

data.name_ja: フレッド・ウィーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Fred Weasley (1 April 1978–2 May 1998) was an English pure-blood wizard and the fourth son and the middle child, the most daring and dominant among the twins of Arthur Weasley and Molly Weasley , younger brother to Bill, Charlie and Percy, older twin brother and best friend to George Weasley, and older brother of Ron and Ginny Potter . Fred's first few years were marked by the height of the First Wizarding War and when Lord Voldemort fell for the first time. He attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry from 1989 to 1996 and was sorted into Gryffindor House.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【フレッド・ウィーズリー】ジョージと双子のいたずら好きな魔法使い。ウィーズリー・ウィザード・ウィーズを開店し、ホグワーツの戦いで戦死しました。

data.name_ja: ジョージ・ウィーズリー
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: George Weasley (b. 1 April 1978) was an English pure-blood wizard, the fifth son and the less dominant among the twins of Arthur Weasley and Molly Weasley , younger brother of Bill, Charlie and Percy, younger twin brother and best friend of the late Fred Weasley, and older brother to Ron and Ginny. George's first few years were marked by the height of the First Wizarding War and Lord Voldemort's first fall.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ジョージ・ウィーズリー】フレッドと双子のいたずら好きな魔法使い。ウィーズリー・ウィザード・ウィーズを開店し、双子の片割れを失った後も店を続けました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Gregory Goyle (b. 1979/1980) was a pure-blood wizard in the same year as Harry Potter at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He was sorted into Slytherin House.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【グレゴリー・ゴイル】スリザリン寮の純血の魔法使いで、ドラコ・マルフォイの取り巻き。クラッブとともにドラコに従い、必要の部屋での戦いで危機に陥りました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Hannah Abbott (b. 1979/1980) was a witch and a member of the Abbott family. In September 1991, she started attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and was Sorted into Hufflepuff House.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ハンナ・アボット】ハッフルパフ寮の魔女でダンブルドア軍団のメンバー。卒業後はネビル・ロングボトムと結婚し、パブ「三本の箒」のオーナーとなりました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Hedwig (d. 27 July 1997) was Harry Potter's pet female snowy owl. Hedwig was an eleventh birthday gift from Rubeus Hagrid to Harry.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ヘドウィグ】ハリーの飼いフクロウで白いシロフクロウ。ハグリッドからの11歳の誕生日プレゼントで、忠実な相棒として6年間ハリーに寄り添いました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Katie Bell (b. 1978/1979) was a witch and a Gryffindor student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry from 1990 to 1997. She was a Chaser for the Gryffindor Quidditch team.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ケイティ・ベル】グリフィンドール・クィディッチチームのチェイサー。7年生の時に呪われたネックレスに触れて重傷を負いましたが、回復してホグワーツの戦いに参加しました。

data.name_ja: ラベンダー・ブラウン
data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Lavender Brown (c. 1980–2 May 1998) was a pure-blood witch, the daughter of Mr and Mrs Brown, and sorted into Gryffindor. She started her education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in 1991, the same year as the famous Harry Potter.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【ラベンダー・ブラウン】グリフィンドール寮の魔女で、一時期ロン・ウィーズリーと交際していました。ホグワーツの戦いでフェンリール・グレイバックに襲われました。

data.book_appearances: PS, COS, POA, GOF, OOTP, HBP, DH
data.description_en: Lee Jordan (b. 1977/1978) was a British wizard, son of Mr and Mrs Jordan, and a Gryffindor student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry from 1989 to 1996 (a couple of years before Harry). During his years at Hogwarts, he became best friends with Fred and George Weasley and liked doing pranks with them.
data.tweet_text_ja: 【リー・ジョーダン】グリフィンドール寮の魔法使いで、フレッドとジョージの親友。クィディッチの実況担当として知られ、不死鳥の騎士団を支援しました。
